<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Return the Favor](/Spells.aspx?ID=1181)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 159

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Favors](/Lessons.aspx?ID=13)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)

 

**Trigger** An ally uses a reaction to grant you a beneficial effect during a combat encounter

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You're unable to leave any debts unpaid. When an ally supports you in a fight, you offer assistance in turn for the favor. The triggering ally gains 12 temporary Hit Points for 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The temporary Hit Points increase by 4.
name: Return the Favor
